title: Minoan structure on Vigla Hill
description: Hilltop structure in the Mesara Plain in south-central Crete in use during throughout the Minoan period. Two Tholos tombs are located north of the building.

properties.description: Point representing the remains of the Minoan structure on Vigla Hill, derived from an OpenStreetMap node after Flouda 2023.
properties.title: OSM location of Minoan structure on Vigla Hill
